function.name: create_idea
function.description: Create a new creative idea or concept. Use this to capture innovative thoughts, potential features, or creative solutions that might be valuable in the future.

idea.description: The idea content or concept description. Be creative and descriptive.
examples: Create a gamified learning platform for developers
Build an AI-powered code review assistant
Design a collaborative workspace with real-time mind mapping

share.description: Who should be able to see this idea. Private for personal ideas, team for collaboration, public for broader sharing.

importance.description: How significant is this idea. Breakthrough for potentially transformative concepts.

tags.description: Comma-separated tags for categorization and discovery.

context.description: Additional context, inspiration, or background for the idea.
examples: Inspired by seeing similar features in competitor products
Came up during brainstorming about user engagement
Based on customer feedback about current limitations
Technical feasibility confirmed through recent research

examples.description: Create a breakthrough idea for public sharing

example.idea: AI-powered code review assistant that learns from team patterns and suggests improvements
example.context: Could revolutionize how development teams work together

examples.description: Create a team-shared idea for collaboration

example.idea: Implement real-time collaborative mind mapping for project planning
example.context: Team expressed frustration with current planning tools

example.idea: Add dark mode toggle to all applications
